title: Flutter Care: Pregnancy
description: Support your pregnancy health with the free, all-in-one Flutter Care Pregnancy Health Companion! This app is designed to be by your side as you navigate pregnancy all the way to postpartum! We understand that inclusive and compassionate support is essential to your health and safety. Your Flutter Care app can equip you with the data and information you need to become your own greatest reproductive health advocate. Our hallmark feature is a new and intuitive fetal movement tracking tool, which makes your data easy to access and understand. The more you use it, the smarter it will get! KEY FEATURES: • 🎈 Due Date Calculator: To kick things off, we’ll help you determine your estimated delivery date so that you can start tracking your weekly development today! • 👶🏽 Week-to-Week Updates: Each week, you’ll receive a new update to help you understand changes to your body and your baby’s development. • 🤰🏾 Fetal Movement Tracker: Research shows that fetal movements are an important indicator of pregnancy health. Count your fetal movements daily during your third trimester with our innovative fetal movement tracker to establish your personal baseline. We offer you the education to understand how to track your movements and make informed choices for you and your baby’s health. • 🔎 Data and Insights: We offer you helpful insights to help you identify your baby’s unique pattern of movements. View visual graphs generated from your data to quickly recognize changes in your pattern that could indicate fetal distress. Easily share this information with your healthcare team. • 📆 Easy-to-Use Calendar: Keep track of important dates during your pregnancy! Not sure of when you’ll reach your next trimester? This app has got you covered! • ✍️ Symptoms and Notes Diary: A space for you to record daily notes, symptoms, and experiences for you to look back on and cherish in the future! • 📚 Evidence-Based Resources: Learn about how to have a safer pregnancy, prepare for birth, and support your postpartum health and newborn baby through our carefully curated selection of medically accurate and evidence-based resources. • 🤗 Find Support Groups: From informed birth choices to racial justice in pregnancy, you’ll find a wide range of organizations that can support your unique needs and values here. ABOUT US Flutter Care is a minority and women-led digital health company based in Vancouver, Canada. The company was founded by a doula whose mother experienced two complicated pregnancies. Our collective mission is to make pregnancy safer, more informed, and more equitable for every expectant individual through digital innovation. Learn more about us and how you can contribute to the #fluttermovement via the channels below. * Instagram: @fluttercareinc * Twitter: @fluttercareinc * Facebook: facebook.com/fluttercareinc * Website: fluttercare.com CUSTOMER SERVICE We're committed to continually improving your experience with this app. If you have any suggestions to help make this app better for the community, we’d love to hear from you at hello@fluttercare.com.
descriptionHTML:
Support your pregnancy health with the free, all-in-one Flutter Care Pregnancy Health Companion! This app is designed to be by your side as you navigate pregnancy all the way to postpartum!

We understand that inclusive and compassionate support is essential to your health and safety. Your Flutter Care app can equip you with the data and information you need to become your own greatest reproductive health advocate.

Our hallmark feature is a new and intuitive fetal movement tracking tool, which makes your data easy to access and understand. The more you use it, the smarter it will get!

KEY FEATURES:
• 🎈 Due Date Calculator: To kick things off, we’ll help you determine your estimated delivery date so that you can start tracking your weekly development today!
• 👶🏽 Week-to-Week Updates: Each week, you’ll receive a new update to help you understand changes to your body and your baby’s development.
• 🤰🏾 Fetal Movement Tracker: Research shows that fetal movements are an important indicator of pregnancy health. Count your fetal movements daily during your third trimester with our innovative fetal movement tracker to establish your personal baseline. We offer you the education to understand how to track your movements and make informed choices for you and your baby’s health.
• 🔎 Data and Insights: We offer you helpful insights to help you identify your baby’s unique pattern of movements. View visual graphs generated from your data to quickly recognize changes in your pattern that could indicate fetal distress. Easily share this information with your healthcare team.
• 📆 Easy-to-Use Calendar: Keep track of important dates during your pregnancy! Not sure of when you’ll reach your next trimester? This app has got you covered!
• ✍️ Symptoms and Notes Diary: A space for you to record daily notes, symptoms, and experiences for you to look back on and cherish in the future!
• 📚 Evidence-Based Resources: Learn about how to have a safer pregnancy, prepare for birth, and support your postpartum health and newborn baby through our carefully curated selection of medically accurate and evidence-based resources.
• 🤗 Find Support Groups: From informed birth choices to racial justice in pregnancy, you’ll find a wide range of organizations that can support your unique needs and values here.

ABOUT US
Flutter Care is a minority and women-led digital health company based in Vancouver, Canada. The company was founded by a doula whose mother experienced two complicated pregnancies. Our collective mission is to make pregnancy safer, more informed, and more equitable for every expectant individual through digital innovation. Learn more about us and how you can contribute to the #fluttermovement via the channels below.

* Instagram: @fluttercareinc
* Twitter: @fluttercareinc
* Facebook: facebook.com/fluttercareinc
* Website: fluttercare.com

CUSTOMER SERVICE
We're committed to continually improving your experience with this app. If you have any suggestions to help make this app better for the community, we’d love to hear from you at hello@fluttercare.com.
summary: Support your pregnancy, birth, and postpartum health with Flutter Care.
